00081 class String : public BoolConvertible<String> {
00082     friend bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00083     friend bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00084     friend String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00085     //friend String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);

00088     friend String operator*(const String lhs, const std::size_t len);
00089     friend std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const String rhs);
00090

00500 
00501     struct Data {
00502 
00503         Data(size_t len) : data(len), refcount(1) { }
00504 
00505         virtual ~Data() { }
00506         Array<uchar> data;
00507         mutable std::size_t refcount;
00508     };
00509     mutable Data * strdata;
00510

00512 
00513 bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00514 
00515 template<>
00516 struct Hash<String> {
00517 
00518     inline sint operator()(String s) {
00519         suint hash = 0;
00520         suint x = 0;
00521         suint i = 0;
00522         uchar * b = s.strdata->data.carray();
00523 
00524         for(i = 0; i < s.length(); b++, i++) {
00525             hash = (hash << 4) + (*b);
00526             if((x = hash & 0xF0000000L) != 0) {
00527                 hash ^= (x >> 24);
00528             }
00529             hash &= ~x;
00530         }
00531 
00532         return hash;
00533     }
00534 };
00535 
00536 inline bool operator==(const String lhs, const char* rhs) {
00537     return operator==(lhs, String(rhs));
00538 }
00539 
00540 inline bool operator==(const char* rhs, const String lhs) {
00541     return operator==(String(rhs), lhs);
00542 }
